abstract: Political Memo; London Mayor Boris Johnson announces he is in favor of Great Britain exiting European Union, breaking support with fellow Conservative Prime Min David Cameron, who is campaigning for Britain to stay; Johnson's announcement may be strategy to position himself as party leader if country decides to leave bloc.
lead_paragraph: The announcement by Mayor Boris Johnson, one of the Conservative Party’s most popular figures, is a new challenge for Prime Minister David Cameron.

headline.main: London Mayor Joins Chorus Demanding Exit From E.U.
headline.print_headline: London Mayor Is Latest Calling for E.U. Exit

snippet: The announcement by Mayor Boris Johnson, one of the Conservative Party’s most popular figures, is a new challenge for Prime Minister David Cameron.
